channel.title: Help
channel.description:
My 317 client sats this
[code=java]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:303) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:316) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
How do i fix

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

How are you running your client? With a .jar file?

Read full topic
